page.title: Microsoft, Google Square Off in Search Arena
page.text: SEATTLE/SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - As Microsoft Corp. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=MSFT.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">MSFT.O</A> prepares to launch its own Web search engine to take on Google Inc. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=GOOG.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">GOOG.O</A>, industry watchers are already speculating over which rival will be left standing in the high-stakes competition.
